name: JWare Free Software
short_description: Umbrella project for all open and free libraries, applications, and documentation created by Sandbox Software MC (SSMC). Our original and most well-known applications includes: AntXtras and its "4Ant" friends. Our newest  libraries include: Gestalt, TestNG Xtras, and MWf4J.
